articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Australia to ban MDH, Everest spices? Regulator ‘assesses alleged contamination' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Hong Kong suspended sales this month of three MDH spice blends and an Everest mix for fish curry.
articles.content: Australia's food safety agency said that it is looking into accusations of contamination related to spices of Indian companies MDH and Everest. The regulator will decide if a food recall was required… [+1700 chars]
